question: How do you feel about working in a team environment?

What do you think about the continuous changes in company operating policies & procedures?
Why did you leave your last job?
Where do you see yourself in five years?

If you could choose any company to work for
How effective has your company been in adapting its policies to fit a changing environment?
What is the greatest mistake you have made at your work?
What are your methods for avoiding work mistake?

What interests you most about this position?
